## Optional:

- [Data Analysis Using Regression and Multilevel/Hierarchical Models](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/052168689X/ref=as_li_qf_sp_asin_il_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=052168689X&linkCode=as2&tag=andrsblog0f-20&linkId=PX5B5V6ZPCT2UIYV) by Gelman A., and Hill, J.:
    + Section 11: Multilevel structures
    + Section 12: Multilevel linear models: the basics
    + Section 13: Multilevel linear models: varying slopes, non-nested models, and other complexities
    + Section 14: Multilevel logistic regression

- [An Introduction to Categorical Data Analysis, Second Edition](https://www.amazon.com/Introduction-Categorical-Analysis-Probability-Statistics/dp/1119405262) by Alan Agresti:
    + Section 10: Random Effects: Generalized Linear Mixed Models
    
    *Download pdf versions of individual chapters, including this one, via Duke library [here](https://find.library.duke.edu/catalog/DUKE005788503). Let me know if you run into problems downloading the chapter.*
